name: Learn: Parts of the Body
description:
With Learn: Animals your kid will be able to learn the parts of the body, spelling, and pronunciation. 

Includes two modes:

1. Learn

   -Touch the part of the body or spelling to hear the pronunciation.

2. Play

   -Learn while having fun. Create your own face by moving the different face objects around

3. Challenge

  •    Different challenge types. (Can be configured in settings)
  •    Your kid will have to select the correct answer out of three options.
  •    Challenge types:
  •       Match Word - Match the part of the body image with the corresponding word spelling.
  •       Match Image - Hear and see the word spelling, and match with the correct part of the body image.
  •    Parts of the body to match can be configured in settings

Different languages available. (Can be configured in settings)

Let us know about other learning activities you would like to add!!
